app_descript:
App Name: Find Objects Christmas Holiday
App Package Name: com.midva.HiddenObjectChristmas

Brief: Get swept up in the festive cheer with Find Objects Christmas Holiday, the enchanting hidden object game that's packed with over 2000 items to discover! Set against a vibrant background of impressive graphics and catchy holiday tunes, this game offers hints, a handy zoom feature for all devices, and promises a jolly good, boredom-free time. Best of all, it's entirely free to play and supports numerous languages, making it accessible to a global audience eager to celebrate the Christmas spirit!
